example.text: To cut costs, railroads have slashed car inspection times to less than a minute, [[user]] reports. Our bipartisan rail safety bill would prohibit railroads from imposing time requirements on inspectors. Many derailments are avoidable—if you put safety over corporate profits. [[url]]
TOMORROW: Our bipartisan rail safety bill is getting a vote in the Commerce Committee. We’re picking up support and pushing for real action to make our railways safer. Tune in at 10 am. [[url]]
? ? BREAKING: Our bipartisan rail safety bill with Sen. [[user]] just passed the Commerce Committee on a strong bipartisan vote and is headed to the full Senate.
Not good enough. Empty promises are only a win for the railroad companies & their shills in Congress. [[url]]

Law enforcement, opioid treatment programs, senators from both parties—more & more are signing on and supporting our FEND Off Fentanyl Act each day. Let’s get this done & keep our communities safe. #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay
We were unsuccessful, as corporations lobbied Congress to give China something called permanent normal trade relations. So they shut down production in Ohio.

Law enforcement, opioid treatment programs, senators from both parties—more & more are signing on and supporting our FEND Off Fentanyl Act each day. Let’s get this done & keep our communities safe. #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay
